name: Basic
description: Flexible row layout for leading/title/content/trailing sections.

use: you need a consistent row layout with title/subtitle/content.

examples.minimal:
Basic(
  leading: const Icon(Icons.person),
  title: const Text('Jane Doe'),
  subtitle: const Text('Product Designer'),
)

accessibility: Ensure titles and subtitles are readable and concise.
do: Use `BasicLayout` when you need custom text styles.
dont: Overload the row with too many widgets.
